tr.td:
Good Friday Kids Celebration:
Kids from infants through 5th grade will be cared for in our Calvary Kids Ministry. Preschoolers and elementary kids will have a fun and meaningful time focussing on "Why the Cross" and then being able to express gratefulness to the Lord at their level.

April 20th
3 Services: 8:00am, 9:45am, 11:30am
The Worship Community will be joining the worship team for this special service!

Resurrection Sunday:
Come join us for our Easter Sunday Celebration all you kids infant through 5th grade. For preschool through elementary will have a special drama and worship celebration put on by four youth who will witness to us about their time they had with Jesus. You will meet Peter, the disciple and Pontius Pilate. You will also hear from the Centurion as well as Mary Magdalene. Our nursery team will be ready to care for all the babies and bring them special music as well.
